name: Coates Kokes
description:
For us, it's all about a quest for the authentic. It's not always easy to find. 
It's not always quick to find. But it's definitely there--usually hanging out in the shaded area where all the circles overlap. 
In our view authentic means keeping it real. Because real has the true power to connect customers, causes, and brands. 
Coates Kokes. We're for truth. We're for authenticity. We're for real.
